    • Method Detail

      • getCommands

        ServerFacadeResponse getCommands(ICommandParams params,
                               UserAttributes ua)
        Gets the list of commands that have been executed for the specified game.
        Parameters:
        params - The json indicating which game to get the commands for
        ua - The user attributes from the requesting user
        Returns:
        The commands executed in this game

      • runCommands

        ServerFacadeResponse runCommands(ICommandParams params,
                               UserAttributes ua)
        Run commands that are in the format that the getCommands end point returns. Allows replaying of events.
        Parameters:
        params - a JSON array of commands to execute
        ua - the user attributes from the requesting user
        Returns:
        The ServerFacadeResponse "Success" or an error

      • reset

        ServerFacadeResponse reset(ICommandParams params,
                         UserAttributes ua)
        Resets the game model to the create game state.
        Parameters:
        params - The JSON indicating which game id
        ua - The user attributes from the requesting user
        Returns:
        The ServerFacadeResponse "Success"
